FlexibleTemplateParagraph: Here, you can pick a ready-made design or build your own unique website using sections from our handpicked templates.\nNumbers (1-8) and capital letters (A-F) on the designs are solely added to guide you through the online order form. This mix-and-match approach allows you to create a website that truly reflects your vision.
ExclusiveTemplateParagraph: Our Exclusive templates are trendy, unique standalone designs that are not intended for mix-and-match.\nThey are crafted to be straightforward enough for you to fill in the online order form without the need for numbers or letters on the designs. However, if you wish to incorporate a specific element from another template, then let us know, and we'll do our best to implement it!
